question: What new designation did Bath receive in 2021 related to UNESCO?
true_answer: Included in the "Great Spa Towns of Europe"
asked_question_translated: Kokį naują vardą, susijusį su UNESCO, 2021 m. gavo Batas?
answer: 2021 m. Batas (Jungtinė Karalystė) buvo įvardintas kaip "Bristolio ir Bato SPA miestai", kaip UNESCO pasaulio paveldo vietas.
answer_translated_eng: In 2021, Bath (UK) was designated as "Bristol and Bath Spa Towns" as UNESCO World Heritage Sites.
